runNextHook

public boolean runNextHook(java.lang.String text,
                           XmlTextRipper xtr)
Hook to be run after each 'next' result is returned from the ripper.

Specified by:
runNextHook in interface XmlTextRipperFunction
Returns:
true to continue iteration; false to halt iteration.

runDoneHook

public void runDoneHook(XmlTextRipper xtr)
Hook to be run after iteration through the ripper is complete.

Note that this is only called by a MultiFunctionTextRipper when execution continues until the end; that is, when no function returns false during 'execute'.

Specified by:
runDoneHook in interface XmlTextRipperFunction
